name: Dinari BTCW
description: The Dinari BTCW dShares token (BTCW.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the WisdomTree Bitcoin Trust (BTCW), a regulated ETF that provides secure and institutional-grade exposure to Bitcoin. Each BTCW.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share of the WisdomTree Bitcoin Trust securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. Leveraging blockchain technology, BTCW.d enables fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, providing a compliant and efficient way to gain Bitcoin exposure through a trusted investment vehicle.
